name: Flatline to SKYHIGH
description:
Dr. Noyer, CEO and founder of the company "Annoying Industries", is making the big bucks from create fascinating yet mildly annoying structures (some include "Skyscraper with no elevator", "Upside down pyramid"). Sickened by his actions, you decide to put a stop to his reign over the world by infiltrating his HQ which is on top of the recently built "Space elevator but the elevator is excruciatingly slow".

--Controls--

AD -> move the player

W -> jump

R -> use powerup

Up, Left, Right arrow keys -> aim the gun

Spacebar -> shoot

You can only shoot while you are standing still.

Tank heals give you 2 hp
